Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wenthworth
ShortDescription: #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Michigan, then resume their normal route on 115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Michigan, then resume their normal route on 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Wenthworth

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cicero/39th
ShortDescription: Northbound 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 39th, Laramie, 31st and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/39th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 39th, Laramie, 31st and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/39th.
